verses.verse: Cast <WH7971> thy bread <WH3899> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325>; for thou shalt find <WH4672> it after many <WH7230> days <WH3117>.
Give <WH5414> a portion <WH2506> to seven <WH7651>, yea <WH8083>, even unto eight; for thou knowest <WH3045> not what evil <WH7451> shall be upon the earth <WH776>.

If the clouds <WH5645> be full <WH4390> of rain <WH1653>, they empty <WH7324> themselves upon the earth <WH776>; and if a tree <WH6086> fall <WH5307> toward the south <WH1864>, or toward the north <WH6828>, in the place <WH4725> where the tree <WH6086> falleth <WH5307>, there shall it be <WH1933>.
He that observeth <WH8104> the wind <WH7307> shall not sow <WH2232>; and he that regardeth <WH7200> the clouds <WH5645> shall not reap <WH7114>.

As thou knowest <WH3045> not what is the way <WH1870> of the wind <WH7307>, nor how the bones <WH6106> do grow in the womb <WH990> of her that is with child <WH4392>; even so thou knowest <WH3045> not the work <WH4639> of God <WH430> who doeth all <WH6213>.

In the morning <WH1242> sow <WH2232> thy seed <WH2233>, and in the evening <WH6153> withhold <WH3240> not thy hand <WH3027>; for thou knowest <WH3045> not which <WH335> shall prosper <WH3787>, whether this or that <WH8147>, or whether they both shall be alike <WH259> good <WH2896>.
Truly the light <WH216> is sweet <WH4966>, and a pleasant <WH2896> thing it is for the eyes <WH5869> to behold <WH7200> the sun <WH8121>.

Yea <WH120>, if a man live <WH2421> many <WH7235> years <WH8141>, let him rejoice <WH8055> in them all <WH2142>; but let him remember the days <WH3117> of darkness <WH2822>, for they shall be many <WH7235>. All that cometh <WH935> is vanity <WH1892>.

Rejoice <WH8055>, O young man <WH970>, in thy youth <WH3208>, and let thy heart <WH3820> cheer <WH2895> thee in the days <WH3117> of thy youth <WH979>, and walk <WH1980> in the ways <WH1870> of thy heart <WH3820>, and in the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869>; but know <WH3045> thou <WH430>, that for all these things God will bring <WH935> thee into judgment <WH4941>.
Therefore remove <WH5493> sorrow <WH3708> from thy heart <WH3820>, and put away <WH5674> evil <WH7451> from thy flesh <WH1320>; for youth <WH3208> and the dawn <WH7839> of life are vanity <WH1892>.
